title: Weather App Prototype
content:
This weather app prototype was created in Adobe XD as a learning project to explore the tool's capabilities for mobile app design. The goal was to practice mobile UI patterns, work with XD's prototyping features, and design a clean, functional interface for displaying weather data.

As a self-directed learning exercise, this project helped me get comfortable with XD's artboards, component systems, and interactive prototyping. The simple concept of a weather app allowed me to focus on the fundamentals of mobile design: clear typography, intuitive information hierarchy, and touch-friendly interface elements.

images.caption: Main Screen: The primary weather display designed in Adobe XD. This learning project focused on clean data presentation and mobile-first design principles.
Secondary View: Additional screen from the XD prototype exploring different ways to display weather information and forecast data.
